summary: AN ORDINANCE authorizing a collective bargaining agreement between The City of Seattle and Seattle Fire Chiefs Association, International Association of Fire Fighters, Local 2898, effective through August 31, 1986; fixing the compensation of certain represented Fire Battalion Chiefs and certain represented and unrepresented Fire Deputy Chiefs for the period of September 1, 1983, through August 31, 1984; superseding inconsistent ordinances, and providing payment therefor.
